entries.journal_entry_description: Purvis Arrison seems to think he's at war with the Tuskens. He's asked you to recon their junk town, just outside of Mos Eisley.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Purvis wants information about the terrain at the nearby graveyards.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Hm, yes. That's about what I expected. While you're checking the terrain there's a ravine nearby there. I want to know more about it.
